title: ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ 2ND CHANCE LOVES THIS PATCH! ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ
body:
ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ EVERYTHING IS TOTES BALANCED AND IS WAY BETTER THAN ANY OTHER PATCH!  
ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ

ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ ALL RAGEBLADES BEING ABUSED WITH NO COUNTER-PLAY MAKE 2ND CHANCE A HAPPY BOY! ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ

ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ NEW FIORA IS LOADS BETTER THAN OLD FIORA! SHE RIPOSTED MY MIND! ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ

ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ WE NEED TO LET REXSAUR PLAY WITH THE DESIGN TEAM MORE! ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ

ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ YEP YEP! ヽ(◉◡◔)ﾉ
